# predictedInterval

**Instance Property**

The expected duration of the predicted event.

## Declaration

```swift
let predictedInterval: TimeInterval
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is one of the defined values of the [doc://com.apple.WirelessInsights/documentation/WirelessInsights/ServicePrediction/QuantizedInterval] type.

## Accessing prediction timing

- **predictedStartTime**: The start time of the predicted event.
- **ServicePrediction.QuantizedInterval**: A type that provides discrete time intervals to express the expected duration of a predicted event.
